price: 不归信的人说：“难道我们和我们的祖先变成土后还要被复活起来吗？
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبٗا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū a-idhā kunnā turāban waābāunā a-innā lamukh'rajūna
